name: Survive or Dice
description:
You are the only d20 in a sea of d6. Survive the incoming dice by moving around. Be on the lookout for what the dice roll, because the result will effect the game.

Move with WASD or arrow keys. Reset with r. Escape to quit.

This game was made in less than 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Note: Avoid going fullscreen when playing in browser as it messes up the text. Also avoid escape in browser.
